template.name: Aero-1000 SNMP
template.description: Template for monitoring Telos Allaince Aero devices over SNMP Capability in AERO.10/100/1000/2000/asi/soft Depends A1K-MIB.MIB.

trigger.name: Audio-Input-status is FAIL or Unavailable
trigger.description: Audio input status is FAIL or Unavailable

trigger.name: Audio-Reference-status is FAIL or Unavailable
trigger.description: Audio reference status is FAIL or Unavailable.

trigger.name: Chassis-hot
trigger.description: Chassis overheat condition.

trigger.name: CN2000-status is FAIL or Unavailable
trigger.description: CN2000 status is FAIL or Unavailable

trigger.name: CPU-Fan-speed is HIGH
trigger.description: CPU FAN speed is HIGH > 5000 RPM

trigger.name: CPU-Fan-status is FAIL or Unavailable
trigger.description: CPU-Fan-status is FAIL or Unavailable

trigger.name: CPU-hot
trigger.description: CPU overheat condition.

trigger.name: CPU-overload
trigger.description: Sustained CPU overload status.

trigger.name: CPU-temperature is HIGH - 70C
trigger.description: CPU-temperature is HIGH - 70C

trigger.name: CPU-temperature is TO HIGH - 90C
trigger.description: CPU-temperature is TO HIGH - 90C

trigger.name: CPU-utilization is HIGH - 70%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization is HIGH - 70% on 5 m

trigger.name: CPU-utilization is TO HIGH - 90%
trigger.description: CPU Utilization is TO HIGH - 90% on 5 m

trigger.name: Engine-status FAIL
trigger.description: Status of processing engine is FAIL

trigger.name: PSU-status
trigger.description: Status of power supply redundancy.

trigger.name: RAM-depletion
trigger.description: Sustained RAM status.

item.name: snmp-internal-link-status
item.description: SNMP service currently linked to Aero.1000. This link goes down during upgrade and reconfiguration.

trigger.name: snmp-internal-link-status is Unlinked
trigger.description: SNMP service currently UNlinked to Aero.1000. This link goes down during upgrade and reconfiguration.

item.name: snmp-internal-link-sustained-failure
item.description: SNMP service unable to communicate with Aero.1000 for an extended time. Failure is critical issue.

trigger.name: snmp-internal-link-sustained-failure is FAIL
trigger.description: SNMP service unable to communicate with Aero.1000 for an extended time. Failure is critical issue.

trigger.name: Video-Input-status is FAIL or Unavailable
trigger.description: Video input status is FAIL or Unavailable.
